Query.Sql: select distinct apc.NHSNumber, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, cc.CriticalCareStartDate as ProcedureOccurrenceStartDate, coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as ProcedureOccurrenceStartTime, coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate, cc.EventDate) as ProcedureOccurrenceEndDate, coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '00:00:00') as ProcedureOccurrenceEndTime, d.CriticalCareActivityCode as ProcedureSourceValue from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS_CriticalCareActivityCode d inner join omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc on d.MessageId = cc.MessageId inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier where apc.NHSNumber is not null and d.CriticalCareActivityCode != '99' -- No Defined Critical Care Activity order by apc.NHSNumber, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, cc.CriticalCareStartDate, cc.CriticalCareStartTime, cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate, cc.EventDate, cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, d.CriticalCareActivityCode

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
Start time of the Procedure, if exists, else midnight.
End date of the Procedure, if exists, else the event date
